Posts.Content: tclawmen wrote: I was told anyone with stage 4 cancer can apply and receive SSDI. True? Has anyone gone thru the procedure? How involved is it? Any help would be appreciated. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: SSDI with stage 4 cancer tclawmen Hrlady53

Posts.Content: Sep 13, 2008 10:38AM tclawmen wrote: Hi All, these boards are so great!!!! My wife was diagnosed last week with stage 4 and while my first concern is obviously for her and to find out everything I can do to support her. We do need to be pragmatic to some degree in terms of how we will be able to hold on financially. Thank you so much for the information and you can expect to here from me quite often whether to ask questions or offer support to others. Once again thanks. Steve
Posts.Title: SSDI with stage 4 cancer tclawmen Hrlady53
